title: Easy one I should imagine - London Zoo Penguin Pool
content:
As seen here...  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/73399796@N00/1202674201/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008040413/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/73399796@N00/1202674201/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/73399796@N00/1202674201/")

But please be as precise as possible, thanks!

 [‹ please help - does anyone recognize these????????](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008040413/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41802 "Go to previous forum topic") [I can't find this typeface... please help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008040413/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41793 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nedtrifle

comments.content: Looks more like futura than gill sans. However I guess it ain’t any of those.
Thanks. Geometric 321 looks like it, although I think they did something with the ’P’! The G and U are spot on though.
The P looks more like [Mostra](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008040413/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/) or something...
